text: Pukara (Aymara for fortress, Hispanicized spelling Pucara) is a mountain in the Andes of Bolivia. It is located in the La Paz Department, Pacajes Province, Calacoto Municipality. Pukara lies north of the Anallajsi volcano, north-west of the mountain Pichaqa and south-west of the mountains Urqipi and Churi Willk'i. It is situated at the Jalsuri River, a right affluent of the Achuta River. The village of Pukara (Pucara) lies at its feet, south-east of it. (unnamed) == References == Category:Mountains of La Paz Department (Bolivia)
title: Pukara (Pacajes)
